Name: Med Mex Cocktail
Ingredients: 30 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
Top up with Aegean Tonic Water
Instructions: POUR ingredients into ice-filed glass and lightly stir.
History: Created in 2015 by Dimitris Dafopoulos, Athens, Greece.
Nutrition: One serving of Med Mex Cocktail contains 129 calories
Garnish: Long strip of cucumber peel around inside of glass.
